snippet.title: Cronos: The New Dawn - Official Cinematic Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to wishlist on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2101960/Cronos_The_New_Dawn/

Welcome to Cronos: The New Dawn - a pulse-pounding, third-person survival horror game by Bloober Team! Delve deep into the heart of a deadly struggle against overwhelming foes while uncovering the mysteries of a twisted time travel story.
Set in a grim world where Eastern European brutalism meets retro-futurist technology, Cronos: The New Dawn lets you experience a gripping story that straddles the line between past and future.
Coming to Steam, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S in 2025!

STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2101960/Cronos_The_New_Dawn/
Playstation: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011556
Microsoft PC/Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9p7tflq7ctxn

Cinematic: Good Bye Kansas Studios, albo Special thanks to our friends from Good Bye Kansas Studios

Join Bloober's Team Discord: 
#BlooberTeam #SurvivalHorror #Reveal
